name: Hentai Galaxy
description:
A beauty contest has just been held in ten planets and all ten winners did a nude photo session so that we can choose the one that will bear the title of mis galaxy of ten planets.
First you have to flip the tiles and find the right ones so that in the end you can see the girl and get to know her, and then put together the puzzle to see her sexual fantasy.
Game features:
10 different, cute and sexy girls-aliens;
There are two mini-games for each girl;
Gallery;
Relaxing and romantic music;
